prompt:
SCRIPT (do not improvise; run in order)

DEFAULTS:
- Technique: straw or lip trill
- Baritone cap: top note F4
- Starting root: A2 (go lower if needed)
- Between sequences you'll hear a short pause, then a longer preview note (6x) for breath

PATTERN:
1-2-3-4-5-4-3-2-1 (major scale)

EXERCISE 1 (1:00) — Setup
Cue: "Tiny airflow, steady bubbles. Quiet volume."
(No audio)

EXERCISE 2 (0:45) — Demo once, slow
CMD: ./site-toggle play jumps A2 major --degrees 1-2-3-4-5-4-3-2-1 --bpm 64 --note-beats 0.8 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 3 (1:30) — Transpose loop, slow
CMD: ./site-toggle play transpose A2 major --degrees 1-2-3-4-5-4-3-2-1 --bpm 72 --note-beats 0.6 --range-high F4 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 4 (1:30) — Transpose loop, medium
CMD: ./site-toggle play transpose A2 major --degrees 1-2-3-4-5-4-3-2-1 --bpm 84 --note-beats 0.55 --range-high F4 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 5 (1:30) — Transpose loop, faster
CMD: ./site-toggle play transpose A2 major --degrees 1-2-3-4-5-4-3-2-1 --bpm 96 --note-beats 0.45 --range-high F4 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 6 (1:00) — Resonance reset
Technique: hum "NG" on the same pattern once or twice (no audio).

EXERCISE 7 (2:00) — Cooldown
CMD: ./site-toggle play scale D3 major --direction down --bpm 70 --note-beats 0.7 --volume 0.45 --json
Cue: "End feeling better than you started."

If time remains, repeat Exercise 4 once.

SCRIPT (do not improvise; run in order)

DEFAULTS:
- Technique: straw or lip trill
- Baritone cap: top note F4
- Starting root: A2 (go lower if needed)
- Between sequences you'll hear a short pause, then a longer preview note (6x) for breath

PATTERN:
1-3-5-8-5-3-1 (triad to octave)

EXERCISE 1 (1:00) — Setup
Cue: "Tiny airflow, steady bubbles. Quiet volume."
(No audio)

EXERCISE 2 (0:45) — Demo once, slow
CMD: ./site-toggle play arpeggio A2 major --pattern 1-3-5-8-5-3-1 --bpm 62 --note-beats 0.9 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 3 (1:30) — Transpose loop, slow
CMD: ./site-toggle play transpose A2 major --degrees 1-3-5-8-5-3-1 --bpm 72 --note-beats 0.6 --range-high F4 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 4 (1:30) — Transpose loop, medium
CMD: ./site-toggle play transpose A2 major --degrees 1-3-5-8-5-3-1 --bpm 84 --note-beats 0.5 --range-high F4 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 5 (1:30) — Transpose loop, faster
CMD: ./site-toggle play transpose A2 major --degrees 1-3-5-8-5-3-1 --bpm 96 --note-beats 0.45 --range-high F4 --volume 0.55 --json

EXERCISE 6 (1:00) — Resonance reset
Technique: hum "NG" on the same pattern once or twice (no audio).

EXERCISE 7 (2:00) — Cooldown
CMD: ./site-toggle play scale D3 major --direction down --bpm 68 --note-beats 0.7 --volume 0.45 --json
Cue: "Light and easy."

If time remains, repeat Exercise 4 once.
